message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.NA. 

The paper deals with video-based action recognition, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The use of covariance features and time series analysis suggests a focus on machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The applications of visual speech recognition and hand-gesture recognition fall under multimedia (cs.MM) and the use of Riemannian geometry suggests numerical analysis (cs.NA).
